summary: Creates a new passphrase to authenticate the user
description: To advance to the authentication, one needs to create a passphrase in order to create JWTs.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Supplies credentials and scheme to advance to the authentication.

id.description: Username or email of the user.

100.description: Authentication is not failed, but requires further steps like two-factor authentication.

scheme.description: Planned authentication scheme for the user. See documentation for value descriptions.

201.description: Authentication is succeed, passphrase is included in the response.

scheme.description: Planned authentication scheme for the user. See documentation for value descriptions.

passphrase.description: Passphrase string to proceed to stealth authentication. Must be stored safely by client.

404.description: Authentication is failed since user with given username/email does not exist or given credentials do not match.
